messages.content: Analyze the uploaded medical scan (which may be a CT, MRI, X-ray, Ultrasound, or PET image). Identify any possible abnormalities, injuries, or conditions present in the image. Respond strictly in the following JSON format and do not include any text outside of it: {"result": "short summary of the suspected diagnosis", "detailed": "detailed explanation of the findings in the scan", "accuracy": numerical accuracy estimate from 0 to 100, "riskFactors": ["risk factor 1", "risk factor 2"], "recommendations": ["medical advice or next steps"]}
